passive.description: Damage dealt inflicts [Burn], dealing [Damage Rate: 25%] Magic Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times (stacks do not boost damage). When [Burn] reaches max stacks, deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies near the carrier and removes all [Burn] stacks.

basicAttacks.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage and applies 1 stack of [Burn].

Replaces Basic Attack with [Scorching Shard]. After 1.2s cast, fires 3 scorching shards in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage toenemies hit and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]. When multipleshards hit the same target, additional shards deal 25%less damage to the original damage.

Replaces Basic Attack with [Wildfire Shard]. After 2s cast, fires a wildfire shard at the target locationthat bounces forward twice. Explodes on contact withenemies, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damageand inflicting 1 stack of [Burn] to enemies in range.

commonSkills.description: Continuously channels flames in target direction for 3s,dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage and inflicting[Burn] to all enemies in range every 0.5s.Can rotate but cannot move while channeling75% Increased Damage against Monsters.

Channels for 0.5s and then launches a molten orb intarget direction that sticks to the first enemy hit, lasting5s and dealing [Damage Rate: 110%] Magic Damage toenemies within 5m every 2s while inflicting 1 stack of[Burn].
Jumps in target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%]Magic Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Burn] to nearbyenemies upon takeoff.

Sprays oil lasting 8s in front, inflicting [Oil Coating] toenemies who enter.[Oil Coating]: Reduces Movement Speed by 50% for 4s.When affected by [Burn], [Oil Coating] is replaced with[Volatile Burn] and cannot be inflicted again for 6s.[Volatile Burn]: Causes Fear and deals [Damage Rate: 56%] Magic Damage every 0.5s for 1.5s.

Activates Overdrive Mode, increasing Casting Speed by 60% and Magic Damage by 20%. Consumes 4 MP every second. Use skill again to deactivate Overdrive. Automatically deactivates when MP is insufficient.

skills.description: After 1s cast, launches scorching flames at the targetlocation to create Hellfire.Hellfire lasts 6s, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] MagicDamage to all players ([Damage Rate: 140%] MagicDamage to mobs) within and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]every 1s.

Launches a Molten Blast toward the target direction, exploding on impact with the first target, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]. The skill can be charged; if the charge duration reaches 2s, a more powerful Molten Blast is launched, exploding for [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage, applying 2 stacks of [Burn], and knocking back all targets within the explosion range by 8m. Gains 1 Charge every 18s, stacking up to a maximum of 2 Charges

After a 1s cast, launches three scorching surges at thetarget location. After 1s, the flames erupt, each dealing [Damage Rate: 240%] Magic Damage and inflicting 1stack of [Burn] and Knockup for 1s to enemies in range.Damage reduces to 50% for enemies that take damagefrom more than one scorching surge.

Launches 3 Core Flare orbs at the target location. Eachnova deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Magic Damage toenemies along the way and inflicts 1 stack Of [Burnl and Istack Of [Scorch]. Additional nova hits on the same targetdeal damage equal to 30% Of the original damageGains 1 charge every 1 5s, up to 3 charges[Scorch): Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times

After a 1s cast, continuously channels for 3s, firing Hell Salvo at the target. Each Hell Salvo deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Magic Damage to enemies hit, inflicts 1 stack of [Burn], and reduces Magic Resistance by 8% for 4s. Stacks up to 6 times.

Channels a starforge beam for 4s after a 1s cast. Deals [Damage Rate: 85%] Magic Damage to enemies in rangeevery 0.5s, inflicting 1 stack of [Burn] and [Scorch].Each hit increases damage by 10%, up to 50%.Cannot be interrupted during channeling and grants a[Target-based Max HP 25%] shield.[Scorch]: Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacksup to 3 times.

Enters Molten Volley mode for 20s. Cannot move during this time; can be exited actively. Basic Attack Replaced: Launches magma at the target location. The magma rolls forward after impact, dealing [Damage Rate: 165%] Magic Damage to enemies along its path and inflicting 2 stacks of [Burn]. Damage increases by 8% for each hit, up to a maximum increase of 40%.
